GR14jivrkadu:5: [*NOTE: This verse is used by Jiva as the maṅgalācaraṇa in other works also.]
GR14jivrkadu:14: lakṣmīr abhitaḥ strītamā gopyo lakṣmītamāḥ prathitāḥ /
GR14jivrkadu:15: rādhā gopītamā ced asyāḥ kā samā rāmā //4// iti //
GR14jivrkadu:16: [*NOTE: This verse is quoted at Gopāla-campū 1.25.]
GR14jivrkadu:18: [*NOTE: Portions of RKAD have been lifted wholesale from the Sandarbhas.]
GR14jivrkadu:19: atra ca nirṇeṣyamāṇā svayaṃ bhagavataḥ śrī-kṛṣṇasya svayaṃ lakṣmī-rūpā śrī-rādhā /
GR14jivrkadu:20: gopī-jana-mātra-saṃvalitaḥ sa upāsyata ity atra śāstrāṇi śṛṇu /
GR14jivrkadu:27: but for mukundasya in the place of hi kṛṣṇasya,
GR14jivrkadu:28: the same as LBhāg 2.1. The following section follows closely on LBhāg 2.]
GR14jivrkadu:65: atra pūrvatra ca tadīya-śabdena tasya bhaktā eva ucyante / tat tv anye -
GR14jivrkadu:74: tathaiva darśitaṃ saptame rājasūyārambhe śrī-yudhiṣṭhirādibhiḥ śiśupālaṃ prati gāli-pradānādinā /
GR14jivrkadu:75: ataḥ śrī-bhagavān apy uktaṃ - pravṛttiṃ ca nivṛttiṃ ca (Gītā 16.7)
GR14jivrkadu:77: tān ahaṃ dviṣataḥ krūrān saṃsāreṣu narādhamān /
GR14jivrkadu:78: kṣipāmy ajasram aśubhān āsurīṣv eva yoniṣu //13//
GR14jivrkadu:79: āsurīṃ yonim āpannā mūḍhā janmani janmani /
GR14jivrkadu:80: mām aprāpyaiva kaunteya tato yānty adhamāṃ gatim //14// (Gītā 16.19-20)
GR14jivrkadu:82: avajānanti māṃ mūḍhā mānuṣīṃ tanum āśritam /
GR14jivrkadu:85: rākṣasīm āsurīṃ caiva prakṛtiṃ mohinīṃ śritāḥ //16// (Gītā 9.11-12)
GR14jivrkadu:87: mahātmānas tu māṃ pārtha daivīṃ prakṛtim āśritāḥ /
GR14jivrkadu:90: satataṃ kīrtayanto māṃ yatantaś ca dṛḍhavratāḥ /
GR14jivrkadu:91: namasyantaś ca māṃ bhaktyā nityayuktā upāsate //18// (Gītā 9.13-14)
GR14jivrkadu:93: mama pūjato 'py abhi sarvatobhāvenādhikā adhika-mat-prīti-karīty arthaḥ /
GR14jivrkadu:98: which finishes yat proktaṃ tasya māhātmyaṃ skānda-bhāgavatādiṣu.]
GR14jivrkadu:105: na brahmaṇo na tu bhavasya na vai ramāyā
GR14jivrkadu:114: [*NOTE: LBhāg 2.12, which begins pāṇḍavāḥ sarvataḥ śreṣṭhāḥ.]
GR14jivrkadu:130: vyākhyātaṃ ca śrī-svāmi-caraṇaiḥ - prahlādasya bhāgyaṃ yena devo dṛṣṭaḥ /
GR14jivrkadu:131: vayaṃ tu manda-bhāgyā iti viṣīdantaṃ rājānaṃ praty āha yūyam iti tribhiḥ /
GR14jivrkadu:133: na tu prahlādasya gṛheṣu paraṃ brahma vasati /
GR14jivrkadu:134: na ca tad-darśanārthaṃ munayas tad-gṛhān abhiyanti /
GR14jivrkadu:137: ato yūyam eva tato 'pi samatto 'pi bhūri-bhāgā iti bhāvaḥ // iti /
GR14jivrkadu:141: aho bhojayate yūyaṃ janma-bhājo nṝṇām iha /
GR14jivrkadu:142: yat paśyatā 'sakṛt kṛṣṇaṃ tad-darśanam api yoginām // (10.82.28)
GR14jivrkadu:155: [*NOTE: The first two lines follow LBhāg 2.22. sarvebhyo for bhagavān.]
GR14jivrkadu:160: [*NOTE: The last two lines are Lbhag 2.25.]
GR14jivrkadu:167: vṛṣṇīnāṃ pravaro mantrī kṛṣṇasya dayitaḥ sakhā /
GR14jivrkadu:169: tam āha bhagavān preṣṭhaṃ bhaktam ekāntinaṃ kvacit /
GR14jivrkadu:171: ekādaśe ca (16.24) tvaṃ tu bhāgavateṣv aham iti /
GR14jivrkadu:172: na ca saṅkarṣaṇo na śrīr naivātmā ca yathā bhavān iti ca /
GR14jivrkadu:179: yad yasmād guṇaiḥ sattvādibhir nārdito na pīḍitaḥ guṇātītaḥ ity arthaḥ /
GR14jivrkadu:182: yad āsāṃ prema-mādhuryaṃ sa eṣo 'py abhiyācate //36// (LBhāg 2.29)
GR14jivrkadu:192: vāñchanti yad bhava-bhiyo munayo vayaṃ ca
GR14jivrkadu:194: bhāvasya durlabhatvād dhi tāsāṃ tat-siddhaye punaḥ /
GR14jivrkadu:197: the first line of which is
GR14jivrkadu:204: yā dustyajaṃ sva-janam ārya-pathaṃ ca hitvā
GR14jivrkadu:212: atra pratiyugmāntarasthasyāpi śabdasya dvayena yugma-dvayaṃ pṛthag avamyate /
GR14jivrkadu:213: tataś ca tad brahmākhya tat taṃ munaya upāsate tad arayo 'pi yayuḥ smaraṇāt /
GR14jivrkadu:215: vayam api samadṛśas tābhiḥ sama-bhāvāḥ satyaḥ samās tābhiḥ tulyatāṃ prāptāḥ /
GR14jivrkadu:216: vyūhāntareṇa gopyo bhūtvā tavāṅghri-saroja-sudhā yayima ity arthaḥ /
GR14jivrkadu:217: atra bṛhad-vāmana-purāṇe tāsāṃ prārthanā pūrvakāṇi vākyāni santi /
GR14jivrkadu:219: tad arayo 'pi yayuḥ smaraṇād ity anenāsurāṇām api mokṣa-dātṛtvena anyatayā prasiddhasya śrī-kṛṣṇasyaivālambanatvena labdhatvāt /
GR14jivrkadu:220: tāsām eva tasmin kevalena rāgeṇa bhajana-prasiddheḥ /
GR14jivrkadu:221: tad etad apy āstām śrī-nārāyaṇāṅga-sthitāyā lakṣmīto 'pi tāsāṃ parama-vailakṣaṇyaṃ
GR14jivrkadu:227: ity anena lakṣmyādikā niravaśeṣā eva striyo nāmubhiḥ sālakṣaṇyaṃ prāpnuvantīti vilakṣaṇā /
GR14jivrkadu:228: tatrāpy udagād ity anena sa prasādas tāsu rāsa-prasaṅge uditavān eva na tu jāta iti svābhāvika-premavatyaḥ /
GR14jivrkadu:229: kevalasya śrī-vṛndāvana-vihāriṇaḥ pūrṇa-bhagavataḥ sarvato vilakṣaṇasya nitya-preyasī-rūpā iti /
GR14jivrkadu:231: tasmāt tābhiḥ saha tasya pūjanam āvaśyakam ity āyātam /
GR14jivrkadu:232: tataḥ sthūṇa-nikhanana-nyāyena tad-arthaṃ tāsāṃ svarūpaṃ nirūpyate /
GR14jivrkadu:234: [*NOTE: This is the starting point of the Bhagavat-sandarbha. The two following verses are quoted in section 16 and 21.]
GR14jivrkadu:235: brahmeti paramātmeti bhagavān iti śabdyate ity (BhP 1.2.11)
GR14jivrkadu:236: ādinā śrī-bhagavantaṃ suṣṭhu nirdhārya tasya śakti-dvayī nirūpitā /
GR14jivrkadu:245: tri-varṇā varṇitāsmābhiḥ kiṃ bhūyaḥ śrotum icchasi // (BhP 11.3.16)
GR14jivrkadu:248: atha yan na spṛśanti na vidur mano buddhīndriyā sarvaiḥ ity (BhP 6.16.20) ādinā /
GR14jivrkadu:256: śriyā puṣṭyā girā kāntyā kīrtyā tuṣṭyelayor jayā ity ādi kiyanto bhedāś ca darśitā (BhP 10.39.55) /
GR14jivrkadu:257: sā ca śakti-dvayī aparā ceti śrī-viṣṇu-purāṇe darśitā --
GR14jivrkadu:265: vande tām īśvarīṃ parām //46// ity anena (ViP 1.19.76-77) //
GR14jivrkadu:266: tatra prathamā śrī-vaiṣṇavānāṃ jagadvad-upekṣaṇīyā yan-mayī eva khalu tasya jagattā /
GR14jivrkadu:267: dvitīyā tu teṣāṃ śrī-bhagavad-upāsyā tadīya-svarūpa-bhūtā yan-mayy eva khalu tasya bhagavattā /
GR14jivrkadu:268: tatraikam eva svarūpāṃśitvena śaktimattvena ca virājatīti /
GR14jivrkadu:270: cic-chakti-mattā pradhānena virājamānaṃ bhagavat-saṃjñam āpnotīti tatraiva darśitam eva /
GR14jivrkadu:271: tad evaṃ śaktitva-prādhānyena virājamānāṃ lakṣmī-saṃjñām āpnotīti darśayituṃ prakaraṇam utthāpyate /
GR14jivrkadu:272: [*NOTE: The following passage ending with viśuddhatvam is in BhagS 117.]
GR14jivrkadu:273: tatra tāvad ekasyaiv svarūpasya sattvāc cittād ānandāc ca svarūpa-bhūtā śaktir apy ekā tridhā /
GR14jivrkadu:283: sā sarva-saṃsthitau sarvasya samyak sthitir yasmāt tasmin sarvādhiṣṭhāna-bhūte tvayy eva na tu jīveṣu ca sā guṇamayī trividhā sā tvayi nāsti
GR14jivrkadu:296: tatra ca sati ghaṭānāṃ ghaṭatvam iva sarveṣāṃ satāṃ vastūnāṃ pratīter nimittam iti
GR14jivrkadu:297: kvacit sattā-svarūpatvena āmnāto 'py asau bhagavān sad eva somyedam agra āsīd ity
GR14jivrkadu:298: atra sad-rūpatvena vyāpadiśyamānā mayā sattāṃ dadhāti dhārayati ca sā sarva-deśa-kāla-dravyādi-prāptikarī sandhinī /
GR14jivrkadu:299: tathā saṃvid-rūpo 'pi yayā saṃvetti saṃvedayati ca sā saṃvit /
GR14jivrkadu:300: tathā hlāda-rūpo 'pi yayā saṃvid utkaṭa-rūpayā taṃ hlādaṃ saṃvetti saṃvedayati ca sā hlādinīti vivecanīyam /
GR14jivrkadu:301: tad evaṃ tasyā mūla-śaktes try-ātmakatvena siddhe yena sva-prakāśatā-lakṣaṇena tad-vṛtti-viśeṣeṇa svarūpaṃ svayaṃ svarūpa-śaktir vā viśiṣṭam āvirbhavati tad viśuddha-sattvam /
GR14jivrkadu:302: tac cānya-nirapekṣayas tat-prakāśa iti jñāpana-jñāna-vṛttikatvāt saṃvid eva /
GR14jivrkadu:304: [*NOTE: This entire section beginning with hlādinī sandhinī saṃvit is found in Bhagavat-sandarbha, section 117.]
GR14jivrkadu:311: śrī-daśame ca viśuddha-sattvaṃ tava dhāma śāntam ity ādi (BhP 10.27.4)
GR14jivrkadu:316: ekādaśe ca sattvaṃ rajas tama iti guṇā jīvasya naiva me iti [BhP 11.25.12] /
GR14jivrkadu:318: ye caiva sāttvikā bhāvā rājasās tāmasāś ca ye /
GR14jivrkadu:319: matta eveti tān viddhi na tv ahaṃ teṣu te mayi //
GR14jivrkadu:320: tribhir guṇa-mayair bhāvair ebhiḥ sarvam idaṃ jagat /
GR14jivrkadu:321: mohitaṃ nābhijānāti mām ebhyaḥ param avyayam // iti [Gītā 7.12-3]
GR14jivrkadu:322: tatra cedam eva viśuddha-sattvaṃ sandhiny-aṃśa-pradhānaṃ ced ādhāra-śaktiḥ /
GR14jivrkadu:327: tad uktaṃ - yat sātvatāḥ puruṣa-rūpam uśanti sattvaṃ loko yata [BhP 12.8.40]
GR14jivrkadu:328: [*NOTE: This appears to be evidence that 8 is the original source of the material,
GR14jivrkadu:332: evaṃ bhakti-tat-pravartaka-lakṣaṇa-vṛtti-dvayakayā guhya-vidyayā tad-vṛtti-rūpā prītyātmikā bhaktiḥ prakāśate /
GR14jivrkadu:333: ete eva viṣṇu-purāṇe lakṣmī-stave spaṣṭīkṛte - (end page 12)
GR14jivrkadu:342: tat-tat-sarvāśrayatvāt tvam eva tat-tad-rūpā vividhānāṃ muktīnām anyeṣāṃ ca vividhānāṃ phalānāṃ dātrī bhavasīty arthaḥ /k
GR14jivrkadu:343: [*NOTE: k. This section can be found in RKAD 12-13.] śrutiś ca parāsya śaktir vividhaiva śrūyate svābhākiī jñāna-bala-kriyā ceti /
GR14jivrkadu:344: athaivambhūtānanta-vṛttikā yā svarūpa-śaktiḥ sā tv iha bhagavad-vāmāṃśa-vartino mūrtimato lakṣmīr evety āha anapāyinī bhagavatī śrīḥ sākṣād ātmano hareḥ /
GR14jivrkadu:347: tatra hetuḥ sākṣād ātmanaḥ sva-svarūpasya cid-rūpatvāt tasyās tad-abhedād ity arthaḥ ity eṣā /
GR14jivrkadu:348: atra sākṣāt-śabdena māyā paraity abhimukhe ca vilajjamānā iti [BhP 2.7.47] vimohitā vikatthante mamāham iti durdhiyaḥ /
GR14jivrkadu:351: paramātmā harir devaḥ tac-chaktiḥ śrīr ihoditā /
GR14jivrkadu:352: śrīr devī prakṛtiḥ proktā keśavaḥ puruṣaḥ smṛtaḥ /
GR14jivrkadu:353: na viṣṇunā vinā devī na hariḥ padmajāṃ vinā //51// iti /
GR14jivrkadu:355: nityaiva sā jagan-mātā viṣṇuḥ śrīr anapāyinī /
GR14jivrkadu:356: yathā sarva-gato viṣṇus tathā śrīs tat-sahāyinī //52//
GR14jivrkadu:359: devatve deva-dehā sā mānuṣatve ca mānuṣī /
GR14jivrkadu:360: harer dehānurūpāṃ vai karoty eṣātmanas tanum //53// iti ca /
GR14jivrkadu:362: niyatiḥ sā ramā devi tat-priyā tad-vaśaṃ tadā iti /
GR14jivrkadu:363: niyamyate svayaṃ bhagavaty eva niyatābhavatīti svarūpa-bhūtā śaktiḥ /
GR14jivrkadu:366: aparaṃ tv akṣaraṃ yā sā prakṛtir jaḍa-rūpikā /
GR14jivrkadu:367: śrīḥ parā prakṛtiḥ proktā cetanā viṣṇu-saṃśrayā //54//
GR14jivrkadu:368: tataś ca bhagavān kṛṣṇa-saṃjña eva iti nirdhārite na viṣṇunā /
GR14jivrkadu:369: vinā devītyādi devatve deva-dehā sā ity ādi tadīya-svarūpa-bhūtā īśa-vāmāṃśa-vartinī lakṣmī kim ākhyā /
GR14jivrkadu:371: tatra dvayor api pūryoḥ śrī-mahiṣyākhyā jñeyā /
GR14jivrkadu:372: tadīya-svarūpa-śaktitvaṃ skānda-parbhāsa-khaṇḍe śiva-gaurī-saṃvāde gopyādity-māhātmye dṛṣṭaṃ yathā --
GR14jivrkadu:373: purā kṛṣṇo mahā-tejā yadā prabhāsam āgataḥ /
GR14jivrkadu:376: lakṣam ekaṃ ṣaṣṭhir ete kṛṣṇa-sutāḥ priye //
GR14jivrkadu:378: tato gopyo mahā devi vidyā yāḥ ṣoḍaśa smṛtāḥ /
GR14jivrkadu:379: tāsāṃ nāmāni te vakṣye tāni hy eka-manāḥ śṛṇu //
GR14jivrkadu:380: lambinī candrikā kāntā krūrā śāntā mahodayā /
GR14jivrkadu:381: bhīṣaṇī nandinī śokā supūrvā vimalā kṣayā //
GR14jivrkadu:382: subhadrā śobhanā puṇyā haṃśītā kalāḥ kramāt /
GR14jivrkadu:383: haṃsa eva yataḥ kṛṣṇaḥ paramātmā janārdanaḥ /
GR14jivrkadu:385: candrarūpī mataḥ kṛṣṇa kalā-rūpāstu tāḥ smṛtāḥ /
GR14jivrkadu:388: ṣoḍaśaiva kalā yās tu gopī-rūpā varānane //
GR14jivrkadu:389: ekaikaśas tāḥ sambhinnāḥ sahasreṇa pṛthak pṛthak /
GR14jivrkadu:390: evaṃ te kathitaṃ devi rahasyaṃ jñāna-sambhavam /
GR14jivrkadu:391: ya etaṃ veda puruṣaḥ jñeyo vaiṣṇavo budhaiḥ //
GR14jivrkadu:395: haṃsaśītety atra prāptasya haṃsasya vācyam āha haṃsa eveti /
GR14jivrkadu:396: sa ca candra-rūpī candra dṛṣṭāntenanoddeśya ity arthaḥ /
GR14jivrkadu:397: kalā-rūpā iti tāś ca śaktayaḥ candrasyāmṛtety ādi kalā dṛṣṭāntenoddeśyā ity arthaḥ /
GR14jivrkadu:400: dṛṣṭāntopādānāc candrasya tādṛśatvam āha pratipad iti /
GR14jivrkadu:405: krūrām īṣaṇāśokānām api bhagavat-svarūpa-bhūtānām eva satīnāṃ mallānām aśanir ity ādivat śrī-kṛṣṇasya kaṭhinatvaa-pratyāyakatvāt /
GR14jivrkadu:407: asatāṃ śāstetivat tadīya-śoka-hetutvād evaṃ ca tat-tan-niruktir upapadyate /
GR14jivrkadu:408: yathā prakāśaika-rūpāyā eva sūrya-kāntor ulūkeṣu tāmisrādi-vyañjakatā /
GR14jivrkadu:409: tataś candra-rūpī mata kṛṣṇaḥ kalā-rūpas tu tāḥ smṛtā iti sphuṭam eva svarūpa-bhūtatvaṃ
GR14jivrkadu:410: darśitam / tad evaṃ tāsāṃ svarūpa-śaktitve lakṣmītvaṃ tāsāṃ siddhaty eva /
GR14jivrkadu:411: tad evam abhipretya tāsāṃ lakṣmītvam āha śrī-śukaḥ --
GR14jivrkadu:416: ṭīkā ca - ramābhir lakṣmyā aṃśa-bhūtābhir ity eṣā /
GR14jivrkadu:418: ato nijaḥ striyaḥ paramānanda-śakti-viśeṣodaya-rūpa-prema-viśeṣa-svarūpo yaḥ kāmas tena sampluto vyāpta iti /
GR14jivrkadu:425: rukmiṇyā ramayopetaṃ dṛṣṭvā kṛṣṇaṃ śriyaḥ patim // (BhP 10.54.60)
GR14jivrkadu:426: ity ādiṣu tasyām eva bhūriśaḥ prasiddheḥ /
GR14jivrkadu:427: ataḥ svayaṃ lakṣmītvenaiva paraspara-yogyatām āha śrī-śukaḥ --
GR14jivrkadu:428: asyaiva bhāryā bhavituṃ rukmiṇy arhati nāparā /
GR14jivrkadu:429: asāv apy anavadyātmā bhaiṣmyāḥ samucitaḥ patiḥ //64// (BhP 10.53.37)
GR14jivrkadu:433: ataḥ svayaṃ bhagavato 'nurūpatvena svayaṃ lakṣmītvaṃ prasiddham eva /
GR14jivrkadu:439: govindam ādi-puruṣaṃ tam ahaṃ bhajāmi //65// iti /
GR14jivrkadu:442: ānanda-cin-maya-rasena prema-rasa-viśeṣeṇa praitbhāvitābhis tat-pradhānābhir ity arthaḥ /
GR14jivrkadu:444: kalātvenaiva nija-rūpatve siddhe punar nija-rūpatayoktiḥ prakaṭa-līlāyāṃ (end page 17)
GR14jivrkadu:446: yata uktaṃ tatraiva śriyaḥ kāntāḥ kāntaḥ parama-puruṣaḥ (5.56) iti /
GR14jivrkadu:447: śrī-parama-puruṣayor aupapatyaṃ nāstīti yuktaṃ ca darśitavān /
GR14jivrkadu:448: etad abhiprāyeṇaiva svāyambhuvāgame 'pi śrī-bhū-līlā-śabdaiḥ tat-preyasī-viśeṣatvam upadiṣṭam /
GR14jivrkadu:449: ataiva gopījanā vidyā-kalā-preraka ity atra tāpanī-vākye śrīmad-daśākṣarastha-nāma-niruktau
GR14jivrkadu:450: ye gopījanās te ā samyag yā vidyā parama-prema-rūpā tasyāḥ kalā-vṛtti-rūpā iti vyākhyeyam /
GR14jivrkadu:451: rāja-vidyā rāja-guhyam ity ādi gītā-prakaraṇāt bhagavaty avidyā-saṃśleṣābhāvāt /
GR14jivrkadu:453: tatas tāsāṃ prerakas tat krīḍāyāṃ pravartakaḥ /
GR14jivrkadu:456: janma-jarābhyāṃ bhinna ity ādau sa vo hi svāmī bhavati iti tasyām eva śrutau,
GR14jivrkadu:460: pāda-nyāsair ity ādau [BhP 10.33.7] kṛṣṇa-vadhva iti śrī-śuka-vacanam /
GR14jivrkadu:461: ṛṣabhasya jaguḥ kṛtyāni [BhP 10.33.21] ity atra ṭīkā ca ṛṣabhasya patyuḥ iti /
GR14jivrkadu:463: ca, gopīpatir ananto 'pi vaṃśadhvanivaśaṃ gataḥ iti. śrīmac-chaṅkarācārya-kṛte yamunāstotre ca,
GR14jivrkadu:465: uddhavaṃ prati śrī-bhagavatā ca -- ballavyo me madātmikāḥ [BhP 10.46.6] iti /
GR14jivrkadu:466: tad idaṃ gacchoddhava vrajaṃ saumya pitror naḥ prītim āvaha iti [BhP 10.46.3] (end page 18)
GR14jivrkadu:467: vallabhābhimānitām ātmani vyajya śrīkṛṣṇasya vacanaṃ brāhmaṇasya mama brāhmaṇīty ādivat gopa-rūpasya mama gopī-rūpā ity arthaḥ /
GR14jivrkadu:468: atas tāsām api tathaivābhimānaṃ tatraivoktam -- api bata madhupuryāṃ āryaputro 'dhunāste iti (10.47.11) /
GR14jivrkadu:469: tathaiva ca kumārīṇāṃ saṅkalpa-vacanam - nanda-gopa-sutaṃ devi patiṃ me kurute namaḥ iti (10.22.4) /
GR14jivrkadu:470: na kevalaṃ sādhāraṇa-rītyā dāmpatya-vyavahāras tābhir mama kintu mad-ātmikā mat-svarūpa-śaktaya ity arthaḥ /
GR14jivrkadu:472: ity ādy uktaṃ punar uktaṃ syāt /
GR14jivrkadu:475: vyarocatādhikaṃ tāta puruṣaḥ śaktibhir yathā // iti / (10.32.10)
GR14jivrkadu:476: tābhiḥ śaktibhir yathā yāvat tathā tatrātiśuśubhe tābhir bhagavān devakī-sutaḥ ity ādi /
GR14jivrkadu:479: svarūpa-śaktitvād evādhikaṃ vyarocata ity ādy-uktam upapadyate /
GR14jivrkadu:481: atas tāsāṃ lakṣmī-saṃjñatvam apy uktaṃ brahma-saṃhitāyāṃ lakṣmī-sahasra-śata-sambhrama-sevyamānam iti /
GR14jivrkadu:484: (end page 19) gopyo labdhvācyutaṃ kāntaṃ śriya ekānta-vallabham iti (10.33.14)
GR14jivrkadu:485: gopya eva śriya kāntaṃ manoharaṃ ekānta-vallabhaṃ raho-ramaṇam /
GR14jivrkadu:486: tasmāt nāyaṃ śriyo 'ṅga iti śukānuvādaḥ sāmānye lakṣmī-vijayaṃ vyanakti /
GR14jivrkadu:496: anayor vallabhaḥ proktaḥ svāmī kṛṣṇākhya īśvaraḥ/
GR14jivrkadu:508: janmāni tava cārjuna [bg 4.5] itivat anādi-siddhatvam eva bodhayati /
GR14jivrkadu:509: patir eva ity eva-kāreṇa prakaṭa-līlāyām upapatitva-vyavahāras tu māyika evety arthaḥ /
GR14jivrkadu:513: tad evam ādibhir viśiṣṭatvenaiva tad-ārādhanād āsāṃ nitya-preyasītvaṃ siddham /
GR14jivrkadu:518: atra kāraṇa-rūpatvaṃ tad-adhiṣṭhātṛ-devatā-rūpatvaṃ coktaṃ brahma-saṃhitāyāṃ prakṛtyā puruṣeṇa ca iti (5.3) /
GR14jivrkadu:519: prakṛtir mantrasya svarūpas trayam eva śrī-kṛṣṇaḥ kāraṇa-rūpatvāt /
GR14jivrkadu:520: tad evoktam ṛṣy-ādi-smaraṇe kṛṣṇaḥ prakṛtir iti /
GR14jivrkadu:522: varṇa-samudāya-rūpaṃ coktaṃ tatraiva - kāmaḥ kṛṣṇāyety (BrahmaS 5.24) ādinā /
GR14jivrkadu:526: ārādhya-rūpatvaṃ ca tatraiva brahma-saṃhitāyāṃ -- īśvaraḥ paramaḥ kṛṣṇaḥ saccidānanda-vigrahaḥ /
GR14jivrkadu:528: kvicid durgāyā adhiṣṭhātṛtvaṃ tu śakti-śaktimator abheda-vivakṣayā /
GR14jivrkadu:529: ata uktaṃ gautamīya-kalpe - yaḥ kṛṣṇaḥ saiva durgā syād yā durgā kṛṣṇa eva sa iti /
GR14jivrkadu:530: yataḥ śrī-kṛṣṇas tatra svarūpa-śakti-rūpeṇa durgā nāma /
GR14jivrkadu:531: tasmān neyaṃ māyāṃśa-bhūtā durgā iti gamyate /
GR14jivrkadu:535: jānāty ekā parā kāntaṃ saiva durgā tad-ātmikā /
GR14jivrkadu:538: muhūrtād eva devasya prāptir bhavati nānyathā //
GR14jivrkadu:545: yayā mugdhaṃ jagat sarvaṃ sarva-dehābhimāninaḥ // iti /
GR14jivrkadu:546: ataiva māyāṃ vyudasya cic-chaktyā kaivalye sthita ātmanīti prathamokteḥ /
GR14jivrkadu:547: na yatra māyā kim utāpare harer iti dvitīyokteḥ māyātīta-vaikuṇṭhāvaraṇa-kathane yathoktaṃ pādmottara-khaṇḍe -
GR14jivrkadu:551: nityāḥ sarve pare dhāmni ye cānye 'pi divaukasaḥ /
GR14jivrkadu:558: ato nāma-mātra-sādhāreṇe 'nanya-bhaktair na vibhetavyaṃ kintu bhāgavatair nitya-vaikuṇṭha-sevakatvāt viṣvaksenādivat sat-kāryā eva te /
GR14jivrkadu:559: arcayitvā tu govindaṃ tadīyān nārcayet tu yaḥ ity ādi-vacanena tad-asatkāre doṣa-śravaṇāt /
GR14jivrkadu:566: sad eva śrī-gopīnāṃ svarūpa-śaktitve prasiddhe śrī-kṛṣṇasya nitya-preyasī-rūpatvaṃ siddham eva /
GR14jivrkadu:567: tatas tābhiḥ saha tasya pūjana āvaśyakatā svataḥ siddhā /
GR14jivrkadu:572: satyaṃ tad-rūpatvaṃ māyikam iti vaiṣṇava-toṣaṇī-nāmnyāṃ śrī-daśama-ṭippanyāṃ kṛṣṇa-sandarbhādau ca pramitam iti vistara-bhayān nātra prapañcitam
GR14jivrkadu:581: dṛṣṭvā rāmaṃ hariṃ tatra bhoktum aicchan suvigraham //79//
GR14jivrkadu:582: te sarve strītvam āpannāḥ samudbhūtāś ca gokule /
GR14jivrkadu:583: hariṃ samprāpya kāmena tato muktā bhavārṇavāt //80//
GR14jivrkadu:585: na ca vaktavyaṃ gokula-jātānāṃ prāpañcika-dehāditvaṃ na sambhavatīti /
GR14jivrkadu:587: śrī-devakī devyām api ṣaḍ-garbha-saṃjñakānāṃ janma śrūyate iti /
GR14jivrkadu:589: yata eva tathā vyākhyātaṃ striya urugendra-bhoga-bhuja-daṇḍa-viṣakta-dhiyo vayam apīti (BhP 10.87.23) /
GR14jivrkadu:590: gāyatrī ca tāsu jāteti pādme sṛṣṭi-khaṇḍe yathā brahmaṇā gopa-kanyāyā gāyatryā udvāhe gopeṣu śrī-viṣṇu-vākyam -
GR14jivrkadu:591: mayā jñātvā tataḥ kanyā dattā caiṣāviriñcaye /
GR14jivrkadu:593: avatāraṃ kariṣyāmi mat-kāntā tu bhaviṣyati // iti /
GR14jivrkadu:594: deva-kanyāś ca yathā śrī-daśame tat-priyārthaṃ sambhavantu sura-striya iti (BhP 10.1.13) /
GR14jivrkadu:595: ata sura-striyas tāsāṃ śrī-kṛṣṇa-priyāṇām upayogāyeveti gamyate /
GR14jivrkadu:599: gopyas tu ṛṣijā gopa-kanyakāḥ śrutijāḥ parāḥ /
GR14jivrkadu:600: deva-kanyāś ca rājendra na mānuṣyaḥ kadācana //
GR14jivrkadu:604: atas tāsāṃ svarūpa-śaktitvād eva śrī-bhagavatas tābhiḥ saha riraṃsā jātā /
GR14jivrkadu:608: tā rātrīr vīkṣya uddīpanatvenānubhūyeti kaumutyenālambana-rūpāṇāṃ tāsāṃ prema-mahimā darśitaḥ /
GR14jivrkadu:609: ātmārāmāś ca munayaḥ ity ādau itthambhūta-guṇo harir itivat itthambhūta-guṇās tāḥ yena tādṛśy api tasya ramaṇcchā jāyate iti /
GR14jivrkadu:610: ataiva vyavahārārthaṃ tasya kaiśoram api mānitaṃ jātam iti śrī-viṣṇu-purāṇe darśitam /
GR14jivrkadu:612: reme tābhir ameyātmā kṣapāsu kṣaptāhitaḥ // (ViP 5.13.60) iti /
GR14jivrkadu:614: yuvatīr gopa-kanyāś ca rātrau saṅkālya kālavit /
GR14jivrkadu:615: kaiśorakaṃ mānayānaḥ saha tābhir mumoda ca // (HV 63.18) iti /
GR14jivrkadu:616: atra kālavid ity asya vyākhyānaṃ tā rātrīr vikṣyeti /
GR14jivrkadu:617: saha tābhir mumoda hetyasya sūcakaṃ rantuṃ manaś cakre iti /
GR14jivrkadu:618: ity ālambana-kāla-deśānāṃ śrī-kṛṣṇāya parama-puruṣatvaṃ darśitaṃ tasmāt hlādinī-śakti-vilāsa-lakṣaṇa-tat-prema-mayy evaiṣā riraṃsā /
GR14jivrkadu:620: śrī-svāmibhir api vyaktam uktaṃ dvātriṃśe virahālāpa-viklinna-hṛdayo harir iti sva-premāmṛta-kallola-vihvalī-kṛta-cetasa iti /
GR14jivrkadu:624: śraddhānvito yaḥ śṛṇuyād atha varṇayed vā
GR14jivrkadu:626: hṛd-rogam āśv apahinoty acireṇa dhīraḥ // (BhP 10.33.42) iti //84
GR14jivrkadu:627: atra sva-priyābhiḥ saṃvalitasya śrī-kṛṣṇasya krīḍāyāḥ śravaṇa-varṇana-mātreṇa bahu-sādhana-duḥsādhyāpi
GR14jivrkadu:628: parā bhaktir udayate udaya-mātreṇa ca hṛd-rogaḥ śīghram apahriyate iti hi spaṣṭam
GR14jivrkadu:629: eveti phalātiśaya-kathanena pravartanāt vidhitvam eva sidhyati /
GR14jivrkadu:630: yasya parṇamayī juhur bhavati na sa pāpaṃ ślokaṃ śṛṇotītivat /
GR14jivrkadu:631: na cādhikārī kaniṣṭha iti vācyaṃ dhīra ity uktatvāt /
GR14jivrkadu:632: atha darśana-mantre nāmāntareṇānirdiśya śrī-vallavīnāṃ nāma viśeṣam ālambyaiva svayaṃ bhagavato nirdeśāt tāsāṃ tat-paricāyakāṅga-rūpatvam eva bodhitam /
GR14jivrkadu:633: gopī-gopa-paśūnāṃ bahiḥ smared asya gīrvāṇa-ghaṭām ity ādi krama-dīpikāyāṃ (KD 3.32)
GR14jivrkadu:636: vallavī-nandanaṃ vande kṛṣṇaṃ gopāla-rūpiṇam //85 ity ādau -
GR14jivrkadu:643: atra sā tvāṃ brahman nṛpa-vadhūḥ kāmam āśu bhajiṣyatīti [BhP 3.21.28] kardamaṃ prati śrī-śukla-vacanavac ca gopa-jātibhir nārībhir ity arthaḥ
GR14jivrkadu:644: kṣobhayantaṃ mohayantaṃ muhur muhur iti vartamāna-dvaya-prayogena nityam eva tad-upāsakaiḥ paṭhyamāna-stavena gopī-kṛṣṇayoḥ nityatvam eva lakṣyate
GR14jivrkadu:645: sanat-kumāra-kalpe ca gopāṅganā parivṛtaṃ mūle kalpataroḥ sthitam ity ādi /
GR14jivrkadu:646: rudra-yāmalasya śauri-tantre gopī-go-gopa-vīto ruru-nakha-vilasat-kaṇṭha-bhūṣaś ciraṃ naḥ ity ādi /
GR14jivrkadu:650: phullendīvara-kāntim ity ādi evaṃ svāyambhuvāgamādāv api /
GR14jivrkadu:651: [*NOTE: KK 3.82; KṛṣṇaS 106 (p49fn) attributed to Mṛtyu-sañjaya-tantra. Padyāvalī 46,
GR14jivrkadu:653: punaḥ prativādī prāha bhavatu nāma tāḥ pūjyāḥ /
GR14jivrkadu:654: kintu tāsāṃ nāma kutrāpi na śrutam /
GR14jivrkadu:662: nāmaikaṃ tac cānvartham iti sarvānte paṭhitam /
GR14jivrkadu:663: yad vā tatheti-daśamy api tārakā-nāmnīty arthaḥ /
GR14jivrkadu:664: tathā skānde prahlāda-saṃhitāyāṃ dvārakā-māhātmye māyāvasaraḥ prastāve uddhava-gamane (12.25-33)
GR14jivrkadu:665: lakṣito vācety ādinā lalitā śyāmalā dhanyā viśākhā rādhā śaivyā padmā bhadrā ity etāni aṣṭau gaṇitāni /
GR14jivrkadu:669: atha śata-koṭitvānyathānupapattyā tāsāṃ tan-mahā-śaktitvam eva gamyate /
GR14jivrkadu:671: bhaviṣyottare somābhā-śabdena candrāvaly eva sūcitā artha-sāmya-prāyāt /
GR14jivrkadu:672: yataḥ śrī-rādhayā saha pratiyogitvam aitihyam asyātra virājate /
GR14jivrkadu:675: rādhe kṣemamayeti tasya vacanaṃ śrutvāha candrāvalī /
GR14jivrkadu:676: kaṃsa kṣemamaye vimugdha-hṛdaye kaṃsaḥ kva dṛṣṭas tvayā
GR14jivrkadu:677: rādhā kveti vilajjito nata-mukha-smero hariḥ pātu vaḥ //90//
GR14jivrkadu:679: but is not in any of the Bilvamangala collections.]
GR14jivrkadu:680: tayor apy ubhayor madhye rādhikā sarvathādhikā /
GR14jivrkadu:683: rukmiṇī dvāravatyāṃ tu rādhā vṛndāvane vane /
GR14jivrkadu:687: atra rukmiṇī-saha-pāṭhād itthaṃ bodhayati yathā dvārakāyāṃ tasyā eva sarvathādhikyaṃ tathā śrī-vṛndāvane tasyā iti /
GR14jivrkadu:690: atha yathā rukmiṇī-kṛṣṇayoḥ paraspara-śobhitvaṃ śrī-śukena varṇitam - asyaiva bhāryā
GR14jivrkadu:691: bhavitum ity ādināṃ [BhP 10.53.37] tathaiva rādhā-kṛṣṇayor api ṛk-pariśiṣṭe śrutyā
GR14jivrkadu:692: varṇitam rādhayā mādhavo devo mādhavenaiva rādhikā vibhrājante janeṣv ā iti /
GR14jivrkadu:693: vibhrājante vibhrājate ā samyak iti śruti-padārthaḥ /
GR14jivrkadu:694: darśitaṃ ca tasyāḥ svarūpaṃ bṛhad-gautamīye baladevaṃ prati śrī-kṛṣṇena -
GR14jivrkadu:695: sattvaṃ tattvaṃ paratvaṃ ca tattva-trayam ahaṃ kila /
GR14jivrkadu:698: sāttvikaṃ rūpam āsthāya pūrṇo 'haṃ brahma cit-paraḥ //94//
GR14jivrkadu:699: brahmaṇā prārthitaḥ samyak sambhavāmi yuge yuge /
GR14jivrkadu:700: tvayā sārdhaṃ tayā sārdhaṃ nāśāya devatādruhām //95// iti /
GR14jivrkadu:701: atra sattvaṃ kāryatvaṃ tattvaṃ kāraṇatvaṃ paratvaṃ tato 'pi śraiṣṭhyaṃ yat tattva-trayaṃ tad aham ity arthaḥ tathaiva bodhayati tathaivāgre dhyāna-prasaṅge -
GR14jivrkadu:717: dhyātvety-ādi-sammohana-tantre - cintayed rādhikāṃ devīṃ gopa-gokula-saṅkulām ity ādi ca /
GR14jivrkadu:718: asyāḥ śreṣṭhatvam ādi-vārāhe kaṭira-parivartanyāṃ govardhana-parikrame tat-kuṇḍa-prasaṅge yathā -
GR14jivrkadu:720: ariṣṭena samaṃ tatra mahad yuddhaṃ pravartitam //101//
GR14jivrkadu:723: snātas tatra tadā hṛṣṭo vṛṣaṃ hatvā sa-gopakaḥ /
GR14jivrkadu:724: vipā mā (?) rādhikāṃ prāha kathaṃ bhadre bhaviṣyati //103//
GR14jivrkadu:726: sva-nāmnā viditaṃ kuṇḍaṃ kṛtaṃ tīrtham adūrataḥ //104// (end page 30)
GR14jivrkadu:731: atra satīṣv api sarvāsu tāsu asyā eva tena saha tādṛśa-prema-vyavahāreṇotkarṣāvagamāt śreṣṭhatvam āyātam /
GR14jivrkadu:733: bālye 'pi bhagavān kṛṣṇas taruṇaṃ rūpam āśritaḥ /
GR14jivrkadu:734: reme vihārair vividhaiḥ priyayā saha rādhayā //
GR14jivrkadu:737: tasmin dine ca bhagavān rātrau rādhā-gṛhaṃ yayau /
GR14jivrkadu:738: sā ca kruddhā tam udare kāñcī-dāmnā babandha ha //108//
GR14jivrkadu:740: priyāṃ prasādayāmāsa tataḥ sā tam avocayat //109//
GR14jivrkadu:741: idaṃ covāca tāḥ kṛṣṇaḥ preyasī prīta-mānasaḥ /
GR14jivrkadu:742: kāñcī-dāma tvayā tanvi udare yan mayārpitam //110//
GR14jivrkadu:743: dāmodareti me nāma priyaṃ tena śubhānane /
GR14jivrkadu:744: nātaḥ prītikaraṃ nāma mama lokeṣu vidyate //111//
GR14jivrkadu:746: bhaktiṃ ca durlabhāṃ prāpya mama loke mahīyate //112//
GR14jivrkadu:747: ulūkhale yadā mātrā baddho 'haṃ bhavitā priye / (end page 31)
GR14jivrkadu:748: udare dāmabhir loke tadā vyaktaṃ bhaviṣyati //113//
GR14jivrkadu:749: anena nāma-mantreṇa yo 'smin māsi tvayā saha /
GR14jivrkadu:750: mām arcayed vidhānena sa labhet sarva-vāñchitam //114// iti /
GR14jivrkadu:751: atrāpi priyayā saha rādhayā iti śrī-kṛṣṇecchayā śrī-kṛṣṇavad bālye 'pi āviṣkṛta-nava-yauvanam eva iti jñeyam /
GR14jivrkadu:756: tatra tādṛśa-bhāvair varṇanaṃ tasyāḥ śrī-śukadevenāpi kṛtam /
GR14jivrkadu:759: ity anena ekāmukhyā eke mukhyāny akevalā ity amaraḥ /
GR14jivrkadu:760: evaṃ śrīmad-gopāla-tapanyāṃ yad gāndharvīti viśrutā sā tu saiva jñeyā /
GR14jivrkadu:765: prīty-arthaṃ tava deveśa dāmodara mayā saha // 117//
GR14jivrkadu:770: vratinaḥ kārttike māsi snānasya vidhivan mama /
GR14jivrkadu:773: gṛhānārghyaṃ mayā dattaṃ rādhayā sahito hare //119// [HBV 16.174-175]
GR14jivrkadu:774: iti yugmatvena upādānāt tasyā eva śreṣṭhatvam /
GR14jivrkadu:776: tathā daśādhyāyi-kārttika-māhātmyaṃ cen nūnaṃ pādmānugataṃ syāt tarhi tatra tad-yugalo pāsanaṃ prakaṭataram eveti /
GR14jivrkadu:777: tathā vāsanā-bhāṣyotthāpita āgneya-vacane 'pi tasyāḥ śreṣṭhatvam / yathā -
GR14jivrkadu:780: rādhā tad-bhāva-saṃlīnā vāsanāyā virāmitā //120// ity ādi /
GR14jivrkadu:781: atra tad-bhāva-saṃlīnā ity anena divyonmāda-maya-vacanaṃ madhupa kitava-bandho ity ādikaṃ tasyā eveti vijñāpya sarvāsu gopīṣu tasyāḥ śreṣṭhyaṃ darśitam /
GR14jivrkadu:783: śrī-kṛṣṇānveṣakartrīṇāṃ tāsāṃ tām evoddhiśya tad idaṃ vacanaṃ śrūyate yathā -
GR14jivrkadu:785: yan no vihāya govindaḥ prīto 'yam anayad rahaḥ //121// (BhP 10.30.28)
GR14jivrkadu:787: tanvan dṛśāṃ sakhi sunirvṛtim acyuto vaḥ /
GR14jivrkadu:795: kiṃ bahunā asyāḥ saubhāgya-vāñchā dvārakā-mahiṣīṇām api śrūyate /
GR14jivrkadu:796: tatas tāsāṃ tādṛśa-vacanaṃ śrī-śukadevenāpy uditaṃ - yathā na vayaṃ sādhvi sāmrājyam ity ādy uktvā āhuḥ ----
GR14jivrkadu:806: limpantya ānanakuceṣu juhus tadādhim //126// (BhP 10.21.17) ity anena /
GR14jivrkadu:808: saha dayitā-stana-maṇḍitena ity uktyā tat kuṅkumaṃ dayitā-stanatas tasya pade lagnam iti gamyate /
GR14jivrkadu:811: tad idaṃ varṇayantīṣu tāsv api sā viśiṣṭety avagamyate /
GR14jivrkadu:812: ayaṃ bhāvaḥ śrītve prasiddhāyāḥ śriyas tatra kāmanaiva śrūyate /
GR14jivrkadu:814: yad vāñchayā śrīr lalanācarat tapo vihāya kāmān suciraṃ dhṛta-vratā iti [BhP 10.16.36] nāgapatnīnām /
GR14jivrkadu:815: yā vai śriyārcitam ajādibhir āpta-kāmair ity ādi [BhP 10.47.62] uddhavasyāpi vākyāt /
GR14jivrkadu:816: na ca rukmiṇītve prasiddhāyāḥ śriyas tatra saṅgatiḥ /
GR14jivrkadu:818: na ca vraja-strīṇāṃ śrī-sambandha-lālasā yuktā - nāyaṃ śriyo 'ṅga ity ādinā (10.47.60)
GR14jivrkadu:820: tasmād rukmiṇī dvāravatyāṃ tu rādhā vṛndāvane vane ity ādy ukta-siddhāntānusāreṇa sarvato vilakṣaṇā yā śrīr virājate tām uddiśyaiva vraja-devīnāṃ tad idaṃ vākyam /
GR14jivrkadu:821: tataś ca tāsāṃ yathā tatra spṛhāspadatā tathāsmākaṃ paṭṭa-mahiṣīṇām
GR14jivrkadu:822: iti / saṅgamaś cāyaṃ divasa eveti sambhāvyate /
GR14jivrkadu:823: tatraiva pulindānāṃ bhramaṇāt kuṅkumānāṃ lepana-karmaṇārdratvāvagamāc ca /
GR14jivrkadu:830: tad idaṃ veṇu-prakaraṇe bhaṇitatvād veṇu-sambandhenaiva gamyate /
GR14jivrkadu:832: tasmād kadācid veṇu-kṛtākarṣāyās tasyā labdha-mūrcchāyā mūrcchāśāntaye sa-kuṅkume svinne vakṣasi sambhramataḥ kevalena śrī-caraṇa-sañjīvanī-pallavena spṛśan gevādyāpi
GR14jivrkadu:834: vādyāpi samyak saṅkocānapagayamat drutam eva sa tasmān niścakrāmeti budhyate /
GR14jivrkadu:835: kāścit parokṣaṃ kṛṣṇasya sva-sakhībhyo 'nvavarṇayann iti uktavān /
GR14jivrkadu:836: yās tu tad-anyās tāsām eva pūrṇāḥ pulindyaḥ ity ādi vacanam /
GR14jivrkadu:837: tasmāt sādhv evoktam lakṣmīr abhitaḥ stritamā ity ādi /
GR14jivrkadu:838: varṇitā ca sā tathaiva śrī-jayadeva-sahacareṇa mahārāja-lakṣmaṇa-sena-mantri-vareṇomāpatidhareṇa yathā --
GR14jivrkadu:844: śrī-jayadevenāpi rādhām ādhāya hṛdaye tatyāja vraja-sundarīḥ /
GR14jivrkadu:850: muhūrtād eva devasya prāptir bhavati nānyathā /
GR14jivrkadu:853: ity utthāpita-pañcarātra-vacanaṃ sarvopari virājamānaṃ bhavatīty alam ativistareṇa pramāṇa-vacana-saṅgraheṇa /
GR14jivrkadu:857: ataḥ sādhūktaṃ śrīdāmodara-rādhārcanam arhati vraja-sthānām ity ādi /
GR14jivrkadu:858: rādhā vṛndāvane yadvat tadvad dāmodaro hariḥ /
GR14jivrkadu:859: darśiteṣu ca śāstreṣu tad-yugmaṃ tat tad-īśituḥ //
GR14jivrkadu:862: na viṣṇunā vinā devī na hariḥ padmajāṃ vinā /
GR14jivrkadu:866: kiṃ bahūktyā kuṇḍa-yugmaṃ tayor yugmena vīkṣyate /
GR14jivrkadu:867: śāstre ca darśitā tasmāt kaimutyād yugmatā tayoḥ //
GR14jivrkadu:869: te bhajantāṃ bhajāmas tu rādhā-dāmodarau vayam //
GR14jivrkadu:870: iti śrī-vṛndāvana-vāsinaḥ kasyacij jīvasya śrī-rādhā-kṛṣṇārcana-dīpikā sadā dedīpyamānatām apadyatām //
